title: KüA Plan Entry Patchset
description: A patch set of a single entry of the KüA plan, allowing to change only selected attributes of the entry

title.description: If present, changes the subject of the planned KüA (or reservation)

comment.description: If present, changes the short explanatory comment to be shown together with the subject.

description.description: If present, changes the longer description of the planned KüA, formatted as Markdown.

begin.description: If present, changes the begin of this KüA

end.description: If present, changes the end of this KüA

timeComment.description: If present, changes the short comment about the KüA's time (e.g. start after another KüA, "open end", etc.).

room.description: If present, changes list rooms this entry takes place in, given as the rooms' unique identifiers.

roomComment.description: If present, changes the short comment about the KüA's room (e.g. the meeting point or which part of the room).

responsiblePerson.description: If present, changes the name of the persons responsible for this KüA or blocker.

isRoomReservation.description: if present, changes whether this is not a real KüA announcement, but instead an informative entry to mark this time slot in this room as reserved for some reason (e.g. some non-public meeting).

isExclusive.description: if present, changes whether this KüA (possibly together with other entries) exclusively blocks its interval for other KüAs (e.g. a mandatory plenum or reserved time slot for talks).

isCancelled.description: if present, changes whether this is not a KüA announcement anymore, but instead informs that his plan entry is no longer valid.

category.description: if present, changes the category this entry belongs to, given as the category's unique identifier.
